TopicTitle: Still confused about EVE and SVE

Articles.Content:
Okay, what I know is, to hav enice reflections and clouds, I need Scatterer.

What I am confused about is whether I just need EVE, just need SVE, or do i place EVE in the folder, but instead of using some config file, use SVE instead?

Scatterer makes the atmospheres and oceans look nicer.

EVE is the plugin which allows you to add clouds.

SVE is what actually adds the clouds.

You will need EVE and SVE. Scatterer is optional. You drop EVE and SVE in your GameData folder and it will work.
